text: Baby Woman is the only studio album by English fashion model Naomi Campbell, released on 3 October 1994, by Epic Records. == Critical reception == Emma Forrest from NME wrote, "Naomi Campbell's debut singing effort is stubbornly not as bad as it should be. Her voice is an inoffensive, ineffectual whining alto, but that's not a problem." == Track listing == == Singles == "Love and Tears" is the only song from the album to have a video. The video was directed by Anton Corbijn. The single reached number 40 in the UK and the top 10 in Italy. === Charts === Chart (1994) Peak ==References== Category:1994 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Epic Records albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Baby Woman
